body:
- Environment support for arguments of some commands were missed in the rollout of spack environments
- For example, `spack location -i` complains about ambiguous specs, even when it's caused by specs outside the current environment

- [x] make all commands that need to disambiguate specs restrict the disambiguation to installed packages in the active environment, as users would expect
title: env: all commands that disambiguate specs should be env-aware
